content: [TextBlock(text="Just got a call from the lab. My experiment with the new AI-driven diagnostic tool finally worked! It identified a rare genetic disorder in the sample set within minutes. Feels like I'm on the brink of something big here, blending tech with medicine. #FutureDoc #AIinHealthcare", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="Just got an email from my mentor at the lab. They're fast-tracking the AI diagnostic tool for clinical trials after last night's success. Feels like all those late nights are finally paying off. Can't wait to see where this leads. #InnovationInMedicine #NextSteps", type='text')]
